snippet.title: Official EPOCH.2 Trailer
snippet.description:
EPOCH.2 by Uppercut Games Pty Ltd

Action-Combat Game Sequel  for iOS, Available Nov 14, Only On The App Store!

Sequel to the acclaimed mobile game EPOCH. EPOCH 2 expands on the success of EPOCH, extending the gameplay systems, adding more graphical polish, more levels, enemies and equipment, and bringing a truly next generation AAA experience to Mobile platforms.

To learn more about EPOCH.2, follow Uppercut Games @uppercutgames on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/epochgame or visit the game page www.uppercut-games.com/EPOCH2

Homepage:

http://www.uppercut-games.com/epoch2/

Facebook:

https://www.facebook.com/epochgame

Twitter:

https://twitter.com/UppercutGames
